course_description: A course designed for the physical actor. This laboratory-focused course will explore and develop a variety of processes unique to the construction of the actor's physical form and coordination. Topics include center, balance, kinesthetics, and rhythm in the context of stage combat, mime, clowning, and physical relationship in scene work.
prerequisites: THEA 120 or THEA_OX 120 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
